info.title: Shopping Cart
info.description:
This API is a basic shopping cart endpoint, consisting of different operations.

1. USERS : Here, users can be created, updated, deleted, fetched, logged in and can also change their password.

2. CATEGORY : Here, category groups are created for produts. CRUD operations can also be performed using its respective APIs

3. PRODUCTS : Here, differnt products are created with different attributes. These products are also associated to different categories. Also, CRUD operations can be performed using respective product APIs

4. CART : Here, logined users can add products item to cart, specifying the quantity for that selected item. They can also perform CRUD operations on this module.
info.summary: A basic shopping cart project that allows users to add products to cart.
